$interpreted: Naya: ...Damn it, we were practically begging for his help, and he still refuses!
Angelia: Can't do anything about it. Let's return to Sunshine Infantry and see what options we have left.
Naya: Sigh... I guess that's our only choice.
Naya: Huh? Theodore's subordinate!?
Jerome: Hm? Rebel general Naya Rosset? Then isn't the person next to her...
Jerome: Traitor Angelia! Surrender yourself, now!
Naya: Whew~ But why is Theodore's subordinate here all of a sudden?
Angelia: People are coming. Quickly, grab him and hide!
Fredrica: Hmm~ Are all the major roads around here blockaded?
Arcane Soldier: Yes, General Fredrica.
Arcane Soldier: All roads that connect Totemtaff to other areas have checkpoints set up. Not even an insect will be able to force its way through them.
Fredrica: If we let any more people run to Sunshine Infantry and help the princess, I'm gonna get chewed out by Theodore again.
Fredrica: Make sure everybody's buckled up. Don't cause me any more trouble.
Arcane Soldier: Yes, ma'am. Also, it's time for your next patrol, general Fredrica.
Fredrica: Still not done with that? Ugh, what a pain in the neck. Why did I come back in the first place...
Naya: General Fredrica!? She is gonna make things really, REALLY difficult.
Angelia: On top of it, she also blocked all the roads that let us return to Sunshine Infantry...
Naya: Angel, what are we gonna do next?
Angelia: I say we go back to the village and ask Sir Hyde for help.
Naya: Him again!? You think he'll help us?
Angelia: We're completely isolated out here. He's our only chance of ever escaping.
Naya: Sigh~ I guess we have no choice. Let's move before anyone finds us,
Female Villager: Miss Naya, Miss Angel!?
Angelia: What happened here?

Female Villager: The bandits we ran into in the morning, 
they brought their leader to attack the village!
Naya: What!? Those stinkin bandits, they really had the gall to come for revenge...
Female Villager: And, and... they took my three kids as well. They demand a huge ransom for their safety,
Female Villager: but I don't have anywhere near that kind of money. *Cries*...
Female Villager: Hyde! What did the stationed troops say?
Hyde: They don't want to report this to the higher-ups. Apparently, one of their colleagues has gone missing and they don't have time to care about us...
Female Villager: Oh god, then what's going to happen to my kids...
Naya: Angel, that "missing colleague" they just mentioned, could it be the one that we just knocked out and tied up?
Hyde: Sis, Miss Angel and I will handle this issue. Please help treat the injured villagers first.
Hyde: I promise, those brats will be back home by tomorrow, safe and sound.
Female Villager: Really? Thank you, I can only count on you now...
Hyde: Princess, could I request the help of Sunshine Infantry? I know that this may be pushing it too far, but I'm out of options. Please, help this village...
Angelia: I really want to help, but the roads to Totemtaff have all been blocked by Theodore. We can't go back right now...
Hyde: ****, what should we do now!
Naya: Angel, you aren't thinking about...?
Angelia: People's lives are in danger. I can't just sit back and do nothing.
Hyde: You mean you're going to rescue them yourselves?
Hyde: There's a lot of men in the bandits' camp. They're also very familiar with the terrain. It's way too dangerous with just you two!
Angelia: This is the only method we have. It's indeed very risky, but I am confident that I can at least keep the children safe.
Angelia: Sir Hyde, where is the bandits' camp? Tell us, now!
Hyde: So this is the demeanor of a king...
Hyde: Never imagined that besides Master Nikola, there would be another person who I would admire from the bottom of my heart and want to follow.
Angelia: Wait, you mean...?
Hyde: If princess helps me rescue my students, I, Hyde Oust, will accompany you to Sunshine Infantry as your strategist.
Hyde: I will assist you in your fight against Theodore and your mission to recapture the lost throne!
Angelia: My sincere gratitude, Sir Hyde.
Naya: But even if Hyde joins us, we still only have three people. Are we still doing it by force?
Hyde: There's a strategy for every army, large or small. I happen to have a plan. Not only will it get you back to Sunshine Infantry, but also rescue the children.
Angelia: Really !?
Naya: I expect no less from our brilliant strategist. So, what's your plan?
Hyde: First...
Hyde: ... princess and officer Naya, how many people can you take on at once?
Naya: Huh?

Model.Text: ...Damn it, we were practically begging for his help, and he still refuses!
Can't do anything about it. Let's return to Sunshine Infantry and see what options we have left.
Sigh... I guess that's our only choice.
Huh? Theodore's subordinate!?
Hm? Rebel general Naya Rosset? Then isn't the person next to her...

Whew~ But why is Theodore's subordinate here all of a sudden?
People are coming. Quickly, grab him and hide!
Hmm~ Are all the major roads around here blockaded?
Yes, General Fredrica.
All roads that connect Totemtaff to other areas have checkpoints set up. Not even an insect will be able to force its way through them.

Make sure everybody's buckled up. Don't cause me any more trouble.

Still not done with that? Ugh, what a pain in the neck. Why did I come back in the first place...
General Fredrica!? She is gonna make things really, REALLY difficult.
On top of it, she also blocked all the roads that let us return to Sunshine Infantry...
Angel, what are we gonna do next?
I say we go back to the village and ask Sir Hyde for help.

We're completely isolated out here. He's our only chance of ever escaping.
Sigh~ I guess we have no choice. Let's move before anyone finds us,

Really? Thank you, I can only count on you now...

I really want to help, but the roads to Totemtaff have all been blocked by Theodore. We can't go back right now...
****, what should we do now!
Angel, you aren't thinking about...?
People's lives are in danger. I can't just sit back and do nothing.
You mean you're going to rescue them yourselves?
There's a lot of men in the bandits' camp. They're also very familiar with the terrain. It's way too dangerous with just you two!
This is the only method we have. It's indeed very risky, but I am confident that I can at least keep the children safe.
Sir Hyde, where is the bandits' camp? Tell us, now!
So this is the demeanor of a king...
Never imagined that besides Master Nikola, there would be another person who I would admire from the bottom of my heart and want to follow.
Wait, you mean...?
If princess helps me rescue my students, I, Hyde Oust, will accompany you to Sunshine Infantry as your strategist.
I will assist you in your fight against Theodore and your mission to recapture the lost throne!
My sincere gratitude, Sir Hyde.

There's a strategy for every army, large or small. I happen to have a plan. Not only will it get you back to Sunshine Infantry, but also rescue the children.
Really !?
I expect no less from our brilliant strategist. So, what's your plan?
First...
... princess and officer Naya, how many people can you take on at once?
Huh?
